attributes.action: Create laws to Stop all nuisance/illegal parking nationwide.
attributes.background: There are no laws to stop any vehicle parking on private roads and land. Even on your own drive. This must be amended now.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about the law on parking, but we're not sure what specific changes you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
